events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's complaint about receiving an incorrect product was categorized under the Refund cluster.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer's recent order.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. Let me help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I've attached a photo of the incorrect item I received instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days and you may keep the incorrect item.
Thanks for resolving this so quickly. I appreciate that I don’t need to return the wrong item.
Refund processed and confirmation sent to the customer. The issue is now resolved successfully.
Checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and that everything is satisfactory with your experience.
Customer has confirmed receipt of refund and expressed satisfaction. Closing the case as resolved.
